description: To copy something exactly as it is (sometimes implies lack of creativity).

examples.chinese: 最快最简单变优秀的方法是模仿,照搬照抄
examples.translation: Fastest way to excel is to imitate, copy blindly

examples.chinese: 记住这样搭配,照搬照抄都很英伦范
examples.translation: Remember this match, copying it blindly gives a British style

examples.chinese: 我的作品可以参考模板,但是不要照抄照搬
examples.translation: My work can be a reference template, but don't copy blindly
